channel.title: [PI]applyDead Error, please help

item.title: [PI]applyDead Error, please help
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

When a player dies, this is the error i get in the source cmd.:

Loaded clipmap in 74ms.
[11/15/12 7:45 PM]: Launching Exilium...Please wait.
[11/15/12 7:45 PM]: Loaded 1023 doors in 259ms.
[11/15/12 7:45 PM]: Loaded 273 Double doors in 43ms.
[11/15/12 7:45 PM]: Loaded clipmap in 65ms.
[11/15/12 7:45 PM]: Server listening on port exilium.no-ip.biz:43594
[11/15/12 7:45 PM]: [REGISTERED]: justin
[11/15/12 7:45 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException
[11/15/12 7:45 PM]:     at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.applyDead(Player
Assistant.java:1320)
[11/15/12 7:45 PM]:     at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1433)

[11/15/12 7:45 PM]:     at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand
ler.java:142)
[11/15/12 7:45 PM]:     at server.Server.main(Server.java:180)

PlayerAssistant:

    public void applyDead() {    
		c.respawnTimer = 15;
		c.isDead = false;
		Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
		if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
			c.killerId = findKiller();
			if(o != null) {
				c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
				if(o.duelStatus == 5) {
					o.duelStatus++;
				}
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom != o.lastKilled && c.duelStatus == 0) {
					o.pkPoints = (o.pkPoints + 4);
					o.sendMessage("You recieved 4 pkPoints");
					o.lastKilled = Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom;
				} else {
					o.sendMessage("You do not recieve pk points because you have killed " +c.playerName+ " twice in a row.");
				}
			}
		}
		c.faceUpdate(0);
		c.npcIndex = 0;
		c.playerIndex = 0;
		c.stopMovement();
					if (c.duelStatus <= 4) {
				c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
			} else if(c.duelStatus != 6 || !c.inArena()) {
				c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!");
				/*o.getPA().movePlayer(
						Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_X
								+ (Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)),
						Config.DUELING_RESPAWN_Y
								+ (Misc.random(Config.RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN)), 0);*/
			}
		resetDamageDone();
		c.DC++;
		o.KC++;	
		c.specAmount = 10;
		c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);
		c.lastVeng = 0;
		c.vengOn = false;
		resetFollowers();
		c.attackTimer = 10;
		if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId].connectedFrom.equals(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerKilled].connectedFrom)) {
					o.sendMessage("You Don't Recieve PK Points for killing yourself!");
		c.faceUpdate(0);
		c.npcIndex = 0;
		c.playerIndex = 0;
		c.stopMovement();
		if(c.duelStatus <= 4) {
			c.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
		} else if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
			c.sendMessage("You have lost the duel!");
		}
		resetDamageDone();
		c.lastVeng = 0;
		c.vengOn = false;
		resetFollowers();
		c.attackTimer = 10;
		removeAllWindows();
		c.tradeResetNeeded = true;
		return;
		}
	}
	
			public void dropitems() 
	{
	if(c.lastsummon > 0) {
if(c.totalstored > 0) {
c.firstslot();
for(int i = 0; i < 29; i += 1)
{
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.storeditems[i], Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absX, Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absY, 1, c.playerId);
c.storeditems[i] = -1;
c.occupied[i] = false;
}
}
c.lastsummon = -1;
c.totalstored = 0;
c.summoningnpcid = 0;
c.summoningslot = 0;
c.storing = false;
c.sendMessage("Your BoB items have drop on the floor");
}

Client.java:

		if(isDead && respawnTimer == -6) {
			getPA().applyDead();
		}

PlayerHandler.java:

players[i].process();

Server.java:

playerHandler.process();

[COLOR=“Red”]Sadly, i’m basically asking for spoonfeed…Ofcourse i’m a learner. I just get irritated by errors like these…I’ve fixed most of them by myself, like a summoning attack error i had, and a trade error i had, but this one i can’t figure out…Please, help me, and if you need more information i will HAPPILY give it ofcourse.[/COLOR]
